page.title: 10Employment in the Quarry
page.content:
There are many{dangers}in the quarry such as slurry pits, lorries, falling stones, machinery and heaps of gravel. My grandad worked in the quarry for 30 years. He saw a workmate killed by falling rock. Two firemen have been killed but overall the quarry has a good{safety}record. When new employees come to the quarry they are given a helmet and boots with metal toecaps. My dad has worked in the quarry for 21 years and my mum works in the offices. At one time most fathers would have worked in the quarry but I did a survey around the school and I found out that out of about 50 families only 7 fathers and 2 mothers work in the Quarry.There is a{tar plant}which produces tarmacadam for roads.There are about 40 men on the tarmac gang.
